bibl.title: The "Argonauts" of Dionysius Scytobrachion.
bibl.note: Summary of a Dissertation. It is possible to identify as new fragments of the "Argonauts" the following texts on papyrus: P. Hibeh II, 186; P. Oxy. XXXVII, 2812; P. Mich. Inv. 1316 verso (previously unpublished).
bibl.seg: Rusten Jeffrey S., The "Argonauts" of Dionysius Scytobrachion.

Summary of a Dissertation. It is possible to identify as new fragments of the "Argonauts" the following texts on papyrus: P. Hibeh II, 186; P. Oxy. XXXVII, 2812; P. Mich. Inv. 1316 verso (previously unpublished).
